Description.Text: Close to Place de la Nation, Pere Lachaise and several key transport links, this new hotel with its contemporary design is situated in Charonne in east Paris, and makes an excellent base for exploring the city. The Parc Floral de Paris, the Bois de Vincennes and the Hippodrome de Vincennes are all nearby. Stylishly furnished, with vintage décor inspired by both Scandinavian influences and outer space, the hotel offers a bar for relaxing with drinks, as well as a cosy library lounge and a garden terrace for warmer weather. Breakfast is also served daily, either in the dining room or in guests` rooms if preferred. There are 30 guestrooms available in three categories, and connecting rooms can be configured to accommodate families of up to five. Decorated in warm blues, greys and browns, they come with a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. There is also a conference room available for up to 40 people, while reception and room service are 24-hours. Metro line 1, providing access to La Défense, the Louvre, Place de la Concorde, the Champs-Elysées and Notre Dame Cathedral, is only 200 metres away. Also nearby is the T3 tramway, which directly serves the Parc des Expositions de la Porte de Versailles.
